subject: My name is Hannah Lumubia, ver
body:
My name is Hannah Lumubia, very sorry for the informal manner in which this letter is reaching you as it was necessitated by my urgent need to get your response.
I came across your Email from my personal search and I decided to contact you believing you will be honest to fulfill my business proposal which I believe will be a very good opportunity for both of us.
I have about $17.5 Million Dollars and I would need your assistance to invest the funds under your care. If this business proposal offends your moral and ethical values do accept my apology. kindly contact me at once if you are interested.
Best Regards.
Hannah

subject: Re: My name is Hannah Lumubia, ver
body:
Hello Hannah,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm quite intrigued by your business proposal, although I must admit it's a bit unexpected. Could you please provide more details about the nature of this investment? What kind of business are we talking about here?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Ruth

subject: Re: My name is Hannah Lumubia, ver
body:
Dear Ruth,

Thank you for your email towards my business proposal. First, let me introduce myself properly so you can understand better. I am a 51 year old widow from South Africa and former employee of the South African shipping industry, currently in Ghana for safety after my husband was brutally murdered. My late husband, James Lumubia, was a retired politician. He is a senior director of the civil society group and also a human rights activist. He was murdered by a secret government assassin for constantly criticizing the government for its bad policies, mistreatment, and murders of innocent citizens.

After his untimely death, I managed to escape to a remote village far from the city, because the same killers are looking for me and my only daughter Olivia. I am still shocked by the horrendous murder of my husband because I cannot believe that he was killed by the same people with whom he spent most of his active days in government many years ago before he retired.

They even confiscated my late husband's property and bank accounts. It has become so difficult for my daughter and I that we cannot walk around the neighborhood without being noticed, because we are afraid of being killed. While I was in the camp, I contacted an NGO to move out of South Africa because our lives are no longer safe in our country. We are wanted in every way possible by the government and its hired killers. We finally managed to escape to Ghana, fortunately with the help of NGOs.

Before his untimely death, we agreed to invest the funds in real estate. I am currently considering investing these funds to purchase properties, i.e. investing in real estate as originally agreed with my late husband, so I am contacting you to assist me in investing the funds on my behalf as the investment manager of money. I would like you to know that in addition to real estate, you can advise me on other areas in which we can invest. Please note that the investment conditions are as follows: 80% for investments, 15% for the fund manager and 5% for expenses.

I need a trustworthy person to help me with this project since I am a widow and do not have much knowledge to handle this on my own. I pray that my daughter and I will one day overcome this trauma. Once we conclude our discussion, we will sign a Memorandum of Understanding specifying the investment teams.

I await your response so we can move forward.
Best Regards,
Hannah Lumubia

subject: Re: My name is Hannah Lumubia, ver
body:
Hello Hannah,

I'm deeply moved by your story and I'm sorry to hear about the unfortunate circumstances you and your daughter are currently facing. It's truly heartbreaking to learn about the loss of your husband, James Lumubia. 

Your proposal for investing in real estate sounds interesting. However, I must admit that I don't have much experience in this field. Could you please provide more details on how you envision this investment? For instance, are there specific locations or types of properties you're interested in?

Also, could you clarify what you mean by "the investment conditions are as follows for for the fund manager and for expenses"? I'm not quite sure I understand.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Ruth

subject: Re: My name is Hannah Lumubia, ver
body:
Dear Ruth,

Thank you for your prompt response and concern regarding the death of my husband and the current condition of my daughter and I here in Ghana.

Regarding providing details about the investment. I want to invest in real estate like buying properties like 2-4 bedroom villas and also 1-3 bedroom apartment blocks for rent in a good location near the city center. You can recommend other fields to invest the funds you know apart from the real estate sector.

What I mean by investment condition is this: 80% of the total value will be invested and 15% of the total value will be your share as the investment manager of the fund, while 5% of the total value will be reserved for any express of both parties towards the realization of this project

I hope you understand my explanation above, therefore this project is a cause for concern. Please, I need you to send me your details, such as your names, address, telephone number and a copy of your passport or valid ID card.

Please can you tell me about yourself and your family to allow me to better understand who I am entrusting with my late husband's funds in your custody?

Thank you. I await your response to allow us to continue.

Best Regards.
Hannah  Lumubia

subject: Re: My name is Hannah Lumubia, ver
body:
Dear Hannah,

I'm so sorry to hear about your husband's passing and your daughter's condition. It must be a challenging time for you.

Your interest in investing in real estate, particularly bedroom villas and apartment blocks near city centers, sounds like a promising venture. Real estate is indeed a solid investment choice, but there are also other sectors that could yield good returns. For instance, the technology sector has been booming recently, and investing in start-ups or established tech companies could be profitable. Another option could be the healthcare sector, which is always in demand.

As for me, I'm just an ordinary person with simple tastes. I enjoy reading books and spending time with my family. We're not a big family - it's just me and my two cats at home.

However, I must apologize as I can't provide personal details such as my address or ID card due to privacy concerns. But rest assured that any discussions we have regarding potential investments will be handled with utmost professionalism and confidentiality.

Could you tell me more about what kind of properties you're interested in? Are there specific locations you're looking at?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Ruth

subject: Re: My name is Hannah Lumubia, ver
body:
Dear Hannah Lumubia,

I'm so sorry to hear about your husband's passing and the situation with your daughter. It must be a challenging time for you.

As for your investment interest in real estate, it sounds like a great idea! Buying properties such as villas and apartment blocks near city centers can indeed be profitable. However, I would also suggest considering other sectors like technology or renewable energy which are booming these days.

In terms of sharing personal details, I'm afraid I can't provide my address, telephone number or any ID copies due to privacy reasons. But rest assured that I am here to help you with your investment queries.

As for me, well, I live a simple life. My family is small but we're close-knit. We enjoy spending time together during holidays and weekends.

Could you tell me more about the kind of properties you're interested in? Are there specific cities or areas you're looking at?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Ruth

subject: Re: My name is Hannah Lumubia, ver
body:
Dear Ruth,

Thank you for your email and I understand everything you said about your family. If you cannot submit your details for privacy reasons, then what details will I send to the lawyer to draft the MOU?

Please note that we are talking about a huge amount of money worth $17.5 million and these funds are deposited in a bank in Dubai, United Arab Emirates.

 I will also send my details along with a copy of my passport once I receive your details.

Best Regards.
Hannah  Lumubia

subject: Re: My name is Hannah Lumubia, ver
body:
Hello Ruth,

Thank you so much for your email. It's always nice to hear about other people's families, it makes the world feel a bit smaller and friendlier, doesn't it?

I understand your concerns about privacy, they are very valid in this day and age. I'm just wondering how we can proceed with the lawyer drafting the MOU without any details? Is there a standard procedure for situations like these?

It's quite astounding to think about such a large amount of money being involved. Dubai must be an interesting place to have such transactions occur.

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Ruth

subject: Re: My name is Hannah Lumubia, ver
body:
Dear Hannah,

Thank you so much for your prompt response. It's really interesting to hear about the funds deposited in Dubai, United Arab Emirates. That must be quite an experience managing such a large amount of money.

I'm curious, how did you come into possession of these funds? And what is the process like for transferring such a large sum internationally? I've never been involved in anything like this before, so it's all very new and fascinating to me.

As for my details, I'm afraid I can't provide them at this time due to privacy concerns. However, I'd love to continue our conversation and learn more about this process.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Ruth

subject: Re: My name is Hannah Lumubia, ver
body:
Dear Ruth,

There is no way we can move forward with the investment without providing your details because that is the basis of our communication as the fund's investment manager.

How are you expected to handle this huge sum of money without having all the details of the fund manager? It's not done anywhere in the world, hence business partnership is concerned.

The bank will open an international online bank account in your name and then transfer the funds to your account so you can transfer them to your other bank accounts. This is the procedure to follow. It's up to you to continue or decline.

I guess from your name Ruth shows you are a woman. How old are you?

Best Regards.
Hannah  Lumubia

subject: Re: My name is Hannah Lumubia, ver
body:
Hello Hannah,

Thank you for your detailed explanation. I appreciate your patience in explaining the process to me. I must admit, I'm not very familiar with these kinds of transactions.

I understand that an online bank account needs to be opened in my name. That sounds interesting! Could you please explain more about how this works? What kind of information would the bank need from me to open this account?

As for my age, well, let's just say I've been around the block a few times! But age is just a number, isn't it? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Ruth

subject: Re: My name is Hannah Lumubia, ver
body:
Hello Hannah,

Thank you for your prompt response and the detailed explanation. I appreciate your patience in explaining the process to me. 

I understand that opening an online bank account is part of the procedure, but I'm a bit confused about how it works. Could you please elaborate more on this? How does opening an online bank account help in transferring funds?

As for my age, I prefer not to share personal details like that over email. I hope you understand.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Ruth

subject: Re: My name is Hannah Lumubia, ver
body:
Dear Ruth,

Thank you for your mails.

First, I would like to point out that I cannot understand the reason behind why you have refused to provide your details not even your age. WHY? I need to remind you that we are talking about a huge sum of money which I presume you are soon going to be the funds investment manager, thus I need you to be open with me hence this project is concern, unless you are telling me indirectly  that you are not interested in helping out with this project, or maybe you are just playing with me over this important matter.

From the start of our conversation, I told you everything you need to know about me and family, so I cannot see the reason you keep hiding your information from me. Based on my understanding, it seems you are not willing and ready to work with me hence this projected is concerned.

The bank will require your details, such as your name, address phone number, passport or ID copy to open an international online bank account in your names.  As soon as the account is opened in your names, you will have access to your account with your personal login details to be able to have total control of your online account to transfer funds to any other account of your choice around the world without any interference.

I hope I have been able to answer your question. I hereby once again, request you provide your details if you really wish to partner with me on this project.

Best Regards.
Hannah  Lumubia

subject: Re: My name is Hannah Lumubia, ver
body:
Dear Hannah,

Thank you for your response and the detailed explanation. I appreciate your openness and honesty about this project. It's really intriguing to me.

However, I'm a bit confused about why my personal details are needed at this stage. Could you please explain more about how the online bank account works? And why is it necessary to open an account in my name?

I'm also curious about the investment process itself. How does it work exactly? What kind of investments are we talking about here?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Ruth

subject: Re: My name is Hannah Lumubia, ver
body:
Dear Ruth,

I guess you have a bank account and when you open the account what details did you submit to the bank before the account was opened. We have talked about the areas to invest the funds and you do not expect me to repeat myself again.  I suggest you go back and read all my pervious emails. I do not intend to discuss further on this matter.

Best Regards.
Hannah  Lumubia

subject: Re: My name is Hannah Lumubia, ver
body:
Hello Hannah,

Thank you for your email. I appreciate your patience with me. I'm afraid I don't quite remember all the details about opening my bank account, it was quite a while ago. But as far as I can recall, there were some forms to fill out and some documents to provide.

As for the investment areas we discussed, I apologize if I've missed something in our previous emails. Could you perhaps summarize the main points again? It would be really helpful for me to have everything in one place.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Ruth

subject: Re: My name is Hannah Lumubia, ver
body:
Hello Hannah,

Thank you for your message and the information provided. I appreciate your patience in explaining the process to me. 

I understand that opening an online bank account is part of the procedure, but I'm a bit confused about how it works. Could you please elaborate more on this? How does the bank ensure the security of my funds during this process?

As for your question, I prefer not to share personal details like my age online. I hope you understand.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Ruth

subject: Re: My name is Hannah Lumubia, ver
body:
Dear Ruth,

I will not repeat myself again on this subject, therefore I suggest you go back and read all my correspondent with you to understand better whatever information you need as I have previously stated everything clearly in my messages.
Again, if you are not ready to submit your details, I kindly suggest you stop sending message to me as I do not intend to further discuss on this matter. Please, do not contact me if you cannot send your details /passport or valid ID.
Best Regards,
Hannah Lumubia

subject: Re: My name is Hannah Lumubia, ver
body:
Hello Hannah,

Thank you for your response. I appreciate your patience with me, as I sometimes struggle to understand things fully. Could you please clarify what exactly you need the passport or ID for? I'm just trying to understand the process better.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Ruth

subject: Re: My name is Hannah Lumubia, ver
body:
Hello Hannah Lumubia,

Thank you for your prompt response and the detailed explanation. I must say, it's quite an interesting process. I'm not very familiar with these kinds of transactions, so please bear with me.

I understand that having all the details is crucial in business. However, I'm a bit hesitant to share my personal information online due to security reasons. Is there any other way we can proceed without sharing such sensitive information?

As for your question about my age, well, let's just say I've been around long enough to see a few things! How about yourself? How long have you been in this line of work?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Ruth
